pullRequest.title: Move assignments with init or record to a separate method
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Related issue: #23376
Approach
To prevent the method too large issue, this fix moves the assignment statements with init or record expressions to a separate method, thus making the init method smaller
Samples

N/A

Remarks

This is a temporary fix while the proper solution needs to be researched on and hence does not resolve the above mentioned issue

Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples

beforeCommit.message:
Move assignments with init to a separate method

To prevent the method too large issue, this fix moves the assignment statements with init to a separate method, thus making the init method smaller

Related issue: https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/issues/23376

afterCommit.message:
Make the method size smaller for splitting init

The method size is made smaller for splitting the ___init_ function in the generated byte code. This would temporarily fix the method too large issue as in https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/issues/23376
